products.name: Cobalt Linda Mini Dress
products.brandedName: ALÉMAIS Cobalt Linda Mini Dress
products.description: A contemporary Australian brand with an artisanal focus, Alemais values cultivating a spirit of adventure with social, environmental, and ethical issues at heart. The brand seeks to incorporate craft and traditional techniques into their clothes to preserve part of history through conscious design. The Cobalt Linda Dress is a sophisticated that plays with colors, shapes, and textures to create a one-of-a-kind look. This silky style boasts long sleeves with bell cuffs, a pointed collar, and a rouleau self-tie waistband. The vibrant pattern is filled with blues, oranges, greens, and yellows that create a luxurious print. Pair with heels and gold jewelry for an elevated date night, dinner party, or cocktail gathering look. Pointed collar Long sleeves with bell cuffs Front button placket with self-covered dome buttons Rouleau self-tie waistband Mini length Material: 100% Viscose Care: Dry clean only

products.unbrandedName: Women's Wide-Leg Tweed Trousers - Pink - Size 4
products.description: To celebrate Lunar New Year, the Maje studio is reinventing workplace classics and giving them a girly rock twist. Pastel shades combine with bold cutaways to create a chic, cheerful wardrobe that will make your day-to-day looks stand out. This season, we've given tweed a shiny makeover with these high-waisted wide-leg trousers. They have a side zip fastening and two patch pockets accentuated with contrasting piping and clover buttons. Embellished with clover charms and a padlock, a belt with removable silver metal links slips easily into the belt loops. Wide-leg shiny tweed trousers Removable chain jewellery belt 2 patch pockets Main fabric: 42% cotton, 41% viscose, 7% acrylic, 5% polyester, 3% polyamide, 2% metalized fibers Braid: 58% acetate, 26% acrylic, 16% polyester Belt: 100% aluminium Pocket lining: 100% cotton Made in France SIZE & FIT Model measurements: 5'8'' Model is wearing a size 36. It's a wardrobe staple: the cropped cardigan has been reinvented with a textured fuzzy knit. Alongside a round neck and long sleeves, it has an embossed button fastening and two chest pockets adorned with embossed buttons. Narrow, ribbed trims emphasise the lines of this cardigan while playing with texture, and fringed criss-cross detailing adds a touch of character to your look. Inspired by Scandinavian simplicity and vintage Americana, Los Angeles based fashion house Anine Bing has created a global brand for the modern woman seeking a timeless yet rebellious approach to style. From luxurious staples to wardrobe basics, Anine Bing provides the highest quality fabrications and materials in each collection that effortlessly fuse together edgy feminine designs.

products.name: Aurelia Linen-Blend Mini Dress
products.brandedName: Banana Republic Aurelia Linen-Blend Mini Dress
products.description: A customer favorite returns in a warm-weather ready fabric and shorter length. This charming mini dress is cut from a twill woven from silky viscose rayon and beautiful, breathable linen, the better to emphasize its flowing cape-like construction. Trapeze Fit: Cut for a flowing, A-line fit. No waist definition. Crew neck with zip and hook-and-eye closure at back. Side pockets. Unlined. Trapeze fit. Short sleeves. Mini length. Model: Size S, 5'10" (178cm).

products.description: Our take on the season's sequin styles, we selected a clear sequin quality here--one we love for its sophisticated shine and almost wet look. We cut this skirt in a simple column silhouette, cutting this special fabric on the bias for a stunning drape. High-rise. Column fit. Invisible zip at wearer's left. Fully lined. High-rise. A-line. Below-knee length Model: Size S, 5'10" (178cm).
